events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. Please advise on the next steps.
The customer’s case has been categorized as a Refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in refund cases for further handling.
Hello! I am sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’m here to help you process your refund.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with the order number so we can verify and begin your refund?
I have attached pictures of the item and here is my order number: 123456789. Please confirm if you need anything else.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your prompt response and for resolving this. I appreciate the quick refund process.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now considered resolved.
We wanted to check in to make sure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As your refund was successful and no further requests were received, we are closing this support case now.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience to help us improve.
